### Returns by Position
The table below provides insights into which positions are historically the best and worst for individual GMs as compared to the entire league. The returns column is the average fantasy points scored for the respective position. The league returns column shows the average fantasy points for all GMs, providing insights into which GMs have done better or worse than the market. Users can chnage the parameters using the input boxes and sliders on the left.
